attributes.action: keep the 2012 Olympic opening & closing ceremonies simple
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is on cost & taste grounds. Every 4 years the hosts try to outdo the previous hosts by putting together the most overblown expensive rubbish, branding it as a cultural celebration. I call on London to take the high ground & keep it simple & classy instead of staging a camp farce.

rejection.details: Please contact the London Organising Committee of the Olympic Games. The Prime Minister and Government do not oversee the opening and closing ceremonies.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
